name: Mystic Zealots
description:
Join the Mystic Zealots Zavig, Tarvut, Fryri, and Razia as they fight to thwart a deadly monster invasion that threatens to overrun their kingdom!

Battle goblins, sand worms, demons and many more across 5 different locations using powerful magical attacks and flashy special moves in this quick but challenging boss rush!

Created for the RPG Maker Forums' Original Character Contest 3, January 2021.
